extendedInfo.description: Call Recorder application that has an ability to:- New - Integration with Dropbox cloud service. !!!- Auto start- Auto delete old records- Sync to your contacts- Shake to sort and change background- Enable/Disable call recording - Auto delete old record- Adjust the media volume- Records all your phone calls- Easy filter and search item- Play/Stop recorded audio by touch on the item- Designed like a glass- Delete recorded items- Lock recorded items to prevent from auto-cleaning- Sorts by all ways- Share recorded items*** This is a 3 day trial, if you like the app please purchase Call Recorder Professional for unlimited use ***Conversations by your cell phone are recorded and stored automatically. Possible to send it to email and listen.Settings are so simple and, designed like a glass. It's easy to find and listen your stored conversations by filtering. Sorts by all ways: Incoming, outgoing, called date and time and talked period.No limited to record and store a conversation by your cell phone, and it can be delete automatically stored conversation.Tested on HTC Hero.Important:: Some samsung Y, captivate, S not install me.Important:: IF RECORD SOUND LOW, PLEASE ON SPEAKERKeywords: Android Call Recorder, Recorder, Call Recording, Call Recorder, Record Call, Record My Call, call recorder, record phone calls, total recall, 2wcr, 2-way call recording, root, s-oof, the best call recorder, call recorder

reviews.title: ICS has made these almost worthless.
reviews.comment: Really needs some kind of auto volume normalization to try and auto-reduce the (loud) local voice and amplify the (soft) other voice.
